title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 2
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: CE QUE J'AI TOUSSE DANS MA VIE!  How often and how long have I been on the rack at night and learned to appreciate that noble passage in the Psalms when somebody or other is said to be more set on something than they 'who dig for hid treasures - yea, than those who long for the morning' - for all the world, as you have been racked and you have longed.

title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 2
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: CELA RENTRE DANS LES PROCEDES DU BON DIEU; ET VOUS VERREZ!  There's another very good thing about Vailima, I am away from the little bubble of the literary life.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " A mis, dans ce palais on peut nous ecouter;Et nous parlous peut-etre avec trop d'imprudcncc,Dans un lieu si mal propre a notre confidence."
